import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import SectionOne from './../projectPage/SectionOne.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const data = { 'heroVideo':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/hero.mp4'), } const a = { 'text':'Businesses such as Network Rail that manage shared spaces are looking for joyful interactions to surprise and delight and increase satisfaction for their customers while they wait. The environments can cause negative emotions for customers, such as overcrowding and unexpected delays.', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/1.png'), } function JoyStory(props) { return(
) } export default JoyStory;
